    static <T> T
    Failure.withReporter​(FailureReporter reporter, Runnable code)
    Temporarily sets the validation reporter for EnsureFailure messages to the given reporter (only for the current thread) while the given code is executed.
    Method parameters in com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.data.validation.ensure with type arguments of type FailureReporter

    static void
    Failure.reporterFactory​(MapFactory<Class<? extends Message>,​FailureReporter> factory)
    Changes the factory being used to map message types to validation reporters on a per-thread basis.

  • Uses of FailureReporter in com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.data.validation.ensure.reporters

    Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.data.validation.ensure.reporters that implement FailureReporter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AssertingFailureReporter
    A validation reporter that asserts false when it hears a message
    class 
    LogFailureReporter
    A validation reporter that logs any messages reported to it.
    class 
    NullFailureReporter
    A validation reporter that ignores all reported messages.
    class 
    ThrowingFailureReporter
    A validation reporter that throws a ValidationFailure exception for any message that is reported to it.
